column75: "For now, the bank has closed our company's account because there have been no banking transactions for the past year. The bank has closed my account, which is unfair, and this rule needs to be changed. As long as the company has money in the account, the account should remain open. We draw your attention to this KYC matter. Since our CEO is abroad and all the banking and company authorizations are with me, the bank should consider this matter and not disrupt banking operations without the CEO. If necessary, the bank can resolve the issue through video call or email; otherwise, as I am authorized and have all the authorizations, and I am the company's deputy, the issues should be resolved with me."

The current financial regulations have created a challenging business environment. Many business owners, myself included, find ourselves compelled to work with AIB due to limited alternatives. However, conducting transactions through AIB is often a cumbersome process.     Withdrawing funds frequently requires spending an entire day at the main branch, as smaller branches are limited to $10,000 USD withdrawals. The strict rules further complicate matters, significantly impacting our operational efficiency.    This situation underscores the need for a more balanced approach that addresses both regulatory requirements and the practical needs of businesses.

Jalalabad: An important city in the eastern region with growing economic opportunities. Expanding to rural areas and districts in this province could enhance access to banking services. Jalalabad having all the required facilities and not visit main branch for small works.  Having all the required services inTorkham: Another significant border crossing point, crucial for trade and economic exchange with neighboring countries.  Expanding to Strategic Development Zones  Economic Free Zones: Targeting economic free zones and special economic areas to cater to businesses and investors.  Industrial Parks: Establishing branches in or near industrial parks to serve the business community.  Expanding to International Expansion Considerations  Neighboring Countries: Considering expansion into neighboring countries like Pakistan, Iran, or Turkmenistan to cater to Afghan expatriates and cross-border trade opportunities.
column75: Mobile Banking Enhancement Developing a user-friendly mobile banking app with features like biometric login, real-time transaction alerts, and comprehensive account management tools.  Online Banking Upgrades as Improving the online banking platform with intuitive navigation, enhanced security features, and streamlined processes for common transactions.  Fintech Partnerships: Collaborate with fintech companies to integrate innovative solutions such as AI-driven financial advice, budgeting tools, and personalized offers.  24/7 Customer Support: Offer round-the-clock customer support via multiple channels including phone, email, and live chat.  Multilingual Support: Provide customer service in multiple languages to cater to a diverse clientele.  Feedback Mechanisms: Implement regular surveys and feedback forms to understand customer needs and areas for improvement.  Branch Modernization: Upgrade branch facilities with modern amenities and self-service kiosks to enhance customer experience.  ATM Accessibility: Expand the ATM network to underserved areas and offer features like cash deposit and account management.  In Particular Customer Service Improvements and those involved with customers should deal politely.
